# How to create a Chapter from scratch?

## Creating chapters in Delightree using text editor.

Keeping everyone on the same page is easy peasy! Once a chapter is published, all users who have access to it will receive a notification, ensuring that everyone is referring to the most current version. üëè

Whether you opt for the "Write with AI" tool or use existing content, you can easily create tailored team-specific content in no time.

### What editing features are available? ü§î

Delightree offers a wide range of editing options to bring your chapter to life!

- format text
- create headings
- add bullet lists
- add numbered lists
- change font colors
- highlight text
- add table
- add image
- add videos
- add file link

Is your chapter still a work in progress? Not to fret. You can easily adjust the visibility after hitting 'Publish' so that your chapter remains hidden until you're prepared to share it with others!

### Adding Videos üìΩÔ∏è

Consider enhancing your chapters with videos! Short, engaging videos can help bring your content to life and improve information retention.

![Screenshot 2024-03-26 at 4.12.56 PM](https://8332146.fs1.hubspotusercontent-na1.net/hub/8332146/hubfs/Screenshot%202024-03-26%20at%204.12.56%20PM.png?width=688&height=444&name=Screenshot%202024-03-26%20at%204.12.56%20PM.png)

### Can you link to other Delightree content? üëç

Absolutely! You can customize your chapter by easily tagging other Delightree content already in your account.

- Tag members
- Tag locations
- Tag forms
- Tag chapters

![Screen Shot 2024-03-18 at 2.38.15 PM](https://8332146.fs1.hubspotusercontent-na1.net/hub/8332146/hubfs/Screen%20Shot%202024-03-18%20at%202.38.15%20PM.png?width=630&height=357&name=Screen%20Shot%202024-03-18%20at%202.38.15%20PM.png)

### What else can I do with Delightree editor? üòç

#### Fixing errors quickly!

Have you ever finished writing a large amount of content and realized you made a mistake by using the wrong word? Maybe you accidentally referred to the wrong recipe name or job role. No need to worry!

The 'Find and Replace' tool is a fantastic feature for quickly fixing errors with just a click of a button.

![Screen Shot 2024-03-18 at 2.42.13 PM-1](https://8332146.fs1.hubspotusercontent-na1.net/hub/8332146/hubfs/Screen%20Shot%202024-03-18%20at%202.42.13%20PM-1.png?width=630&height=296&name=Screen%20Shot%202024-03-18%20at%202.42.13%20PM-1.png)

#### Write with AI

When you find yourself struggling to come up with new content, the write with AI tool will quickly become your trusted companion.

![Screen Shot 2024-03-18 at 2.49.27 PM](https://8332146.fs1.hubspotusercontent-na1.net/hub/8332146/hubfs/Screen%20Shot%202024-03-18%20at%202.49.27%20PM.png?width=630&height=347&name=Screen%20Shot%202024-03-18%20at%202.49.27%20PM.png)

Just input a prompt into the search bar or choose from one of the examples as shown below.

![Screen Shot 2024-03-19 at 9.34.14 AM](https://8332146.fs1.hubspotusercontent-na1.net/hub/8332146/hubfs/Screen%20Shot%202024-03-19%20at%209.34.14%20AM.png?width=630&height=262&name=Screen%20Shot%202024-03-19%20at%209.34.14%20AM.png)The preview of the content will be displayed, giving you the option to use the provided response or generate a different version.

![Screen Shot 2024-03-19 at 9.33.22 AM](https://8332146.fs1.hubspotusercontent-na1.net/hub/8332146/hubfs/Screen%20Shot%202024-03-19%20at%209.33.22%20AM.png?width=688&height=365&name=Screen%20Shot%202024-03-19%20at%209.33.22%20AM.png)

It is recommended to review any AI-generated content to ensure it aligns with your brand's voice and tone.

### Best Practice:

Please keep in mind that the main purpose of the knowledge base is to help your team stay organized and informed.¬†**The most effective way for your team to utilize Delightree is by searching for specific key terms to find the information they need, rather than just skimming through content.**

Instead of merely linking to an existing pdf or manual, consider breaking up the content into easily searchable, bite-sized chapters for your team. Remember, while pdfs are not searchable in Delightree, chapters are, making it easier for your team to access the information they need.
